Sejak itu, Sak cuba meyakinkan Tin bahawa kehidupan seorang penjenayah bukanlah sesuatu yang harus dia kejar.

programme.title: London Has Fallen
programme.desc: Di London untuk pengebumian Perdana Menteri, Mike Banning terperangkap dalam plot untuk membunuh semua pemimpin dunia yang hadir.

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep10
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Nasha melarikan diri kerana tidak dapat menerima kenyataan Dato' Amir dan Mak Jah adalah ibu bapa kandungnya. Farish akhirnya berjumpa Nasha, dia memujuknya menerima kenyataan sebenar. Nasha kemudiannya menerima hakikat tersebut. Farish juga berjaya memujuk ibu dan bapanya menerima Nasha sebagai menantu mereka. Danial masih menjadi bodyguard Eliza, dia berjanji akan menjaga Eliza seperti diamanahkan. Rashid telah diberitahu oleh ibunya, dia dan Eliza sebenarnya adalah adik-beradik. Rashid kemudiannya dimanahkan untuk menguruskan syarikat Dato' Zaidi. Rahul pula sebagai bodyguard Maya berjaya mengesan Boboy yang telah menghilangkan diri. Maya berjanji akan menjadi ibu yang terbaik, dia bersama-sama dengan Mikhail dan Zulaikha akan memberipenjagaan kepada Boboy.

programme.title: Bisikan Iblis
programme.desc: Di sekolah semua perempuan, akan sentiasa ada kematian misteri setiap tahun, dan Nany didaftarkan di sekolah ini.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep14
programme.desc: Memaparkan Shah, Adam dan Daniel terus mengesan lembaga baju yang memakai baju budaya Jepun dan satu malam mereka ternampaknya dan rupanya cantik. Mereka tidak gunakan senjata biasa tetapi menggunakan taktik memujuk. Mereka gagal juga, lembaga itu terus menghilang. Di waktu siang, Shah secara kebetulan bertemu Ana dan Shah seperti biasa cuba merayu dan memikatnya. Kebetulan Adam ternampak lebih-lebih kelihatan Ana menyukai Shah semula. Bila Ana beredar, Adam bersemuka meminta Shah memaklumkan tentang Nur. Adam tidak setuju. Dalam pada itu janda yang berbaik dengan Bad terus akrab, Nur tidak menyukainya lalu menceritakan kepada ibunya. Ibunya hanya menyokong sekurang-kurangnya Nur akan mudah. Encik Tar masih memujuk encik Bad untuk bergabung sebaliknya encik Bad masih memberi alasan sedang berfikir dan dia juga meminta pandangan janda yang suka mendekainya. Oleh kerana sukar lembaga baju di perangkap Shah, Adam dan Daniel memerangkap lembaga Jepun dahulu. Dengan kerjasama lembaga Jepun akhirnya kembaga baju dapat diperangkap mereka. Kini Sabariah dan suaminya senang hati.

programme.title: Budak Magik Ep3
programme.desc: Episod – 3 memaparkan kisah bagaimana Imran, Maira, Haikal dan Zara dikejutkan dengan kejadian aneh sebaik pulih dari demam. Mereka seakan-akan memiliki tenaga dan kuasa luar biasa yang mungkin ada kaitan dengan lintasan cahaya yang mereka lihat tempoh hari. Haikal memiliki kelebihan berlari sepantas kilat sementara Zara pula memiliki kuasa jeritan yang mampu memusnahkan. Juga dipaparkan kisah Imran menjejaki bola cahaya yang telah membawanya ke satu kawasan hutan sehingga dia hilang panduan untuk keluar

programme.title: The Hotel
programme.desc: Sarapee dan Pun mewarisi rumah agam pantai daripada Luang Narubal, suami dan dermawan yang mereka khianati dan tinggalkan untuk mati dalam kesedihan. Kedua-duanya kini memutuskan untuk berpindah dan menjadikan rumah agam itu sebagai sebuah hotel untuk menjana wang. Dua puluh lima tahun berlalu. Sarapee telah meninggal dunia. Dua anaknya hasil perkahwinannya dengan Pun, Parinya dan Patama, kini sudah dewasa dan mereka pulang dari menetap di luar negara untuk mengambil alih hotel tersebut. Selepas mengubahsuainya, misteri bermula. Kematian berlaku berulang kali, dan kadangkala Parinya dan Pattama menyaksikannya. Tidak lama kemudian mereka adalah satu-satunya orang yang tinggal untuk membongkar misteri dan berjuang untuk terus hidup.

programme.title: Ribut Barat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri, Adnan dan Azizah baru pulang ke tanah air selepas berkahwin di England. Azizah sering memandang rendah kepada keluarga suaminya yang berasal dari kampung. Adnan terlalu sayangkan isterinya sehingga sanggup melupakan ibu bapanya untuk menyenangkan hati isteri. Budaya barat yang diamalkan Adnan dan isterinya itu juga telah menyebabkan rumahtangga mereka retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Tiada Esok Bagimu
programme.desc: Ghazlan seorang arkitek yang mempunyai dua orang anak, Amir dan Emi. Akibat satu peristiwa yang menyebabkan kematian Emi, Ghazlan menjadi buta kerana terlalu sedih. Selepas itu Ghazlan bersama isterinya mengambil seorang anak angkat yang dinamakan Emi. Identiti sebenar Emi dirahsiakan sehingga dia dewasa. Satu tragedi berlaku kepada Emi sehingga dia nekad untuk mencari ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Semalam di Malaysia
programme.desc: Victor Abdullah, penyanyi terkenal yang menetap di Malaysia berkenalan dengan Sandra, mahasiswa di Indonesia. Rumimah, pembantu rumah Sandra ternyata bukanlah seperti apa yang disangka Sandra. Rahsia dan kisah silam terungkit kembali apabila suami dan anak lelakinya yang disangka telah meninggal dunia sebenarnya masih hidup. Pertemuan semula mereka telah membongkar segalanya.

programme.title: Menanti Hari Esok
programme.desc: Kisah sebuah keluarga yang mengalami kejatuhan moral kerana pegangan agama yang tidak utuh. Talib yang menghidapi barah harus melalui pelbagai konflik sementara menunggu masa untuk pergi. Anaknya, Jalil mula bersikap derhaka manakala anak keduanya, Ayu hamil luar nikah. Perasaan dikhianati dan ingin mengkhianati mula menguasai diri, pengakhirannya membawa kepada satu kematian.

programme.title: Melati Putih
programme.desc: Melati bercita-cita tinggi tetapi tidak dapat melaksanakannya kerana tergoda dengan seorang doktor muda. Akibat hubungan dengan doktor itu, nama baiknya telah tercemar. Seorang pemuda cacat di kampung itu jatuh hati padanya tetapi cinta lelaki itu dipermainkannya. Setelah Melati dikecewakan oleh doktor itu, barulah dia sedar cinta suci si pemuda itu.

programme.title: Tiada Esok Bagimu
programme.desc: Ghazlan seorang arkitek yang mempunyai dua orang anak, Amir dan Emi. Akibat satu peristiwa yang menyebabkan kematian Emi, Ghazlan menjadi buta kerana terlalu sedih. Selepas itu Ghazlan bersama isterinya mengambil seorang anak angkat yang dinamakan Emi. Identiti sebenar Emi dirahsiakan sehingga dia dewasa. Satu tragedi berlaku kepada Emi sehingga dia nekad untuk mencari ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Ribut Barat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri, Adnan dan Azizah baru pulang ke tanah air selepas berkahwin di England. Azizah sering memandang rendah kepada keluarga suaminya yang berasal dari kampung. Adnan terlalu sayangkan isterinya sehingga sanggup melupakan ibu bapanya untuk menyenangkan hati isteri. Budaya barat yang diamalkan Adnan dan isterinya itu juga telah menyebabkan rumahtangga mereka retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Bila Hati Telah Retak
programme.desc: Diceraikan oleh suami kaki perempuan, seorang wanita memulakan kehidupan baru. Bekerja sebagai bidan kerajaan - namun tidak disenangi seorang bidan tradisional. Pelbagai tohmahan dilemparkan kepadanya sebagai cara untuk dia diusir keluar tetapi bapa saudaranya ada memberikan sokongan moral. Setelah satu insiden berlaku di kampung itu, penduduk lain mula menerimanya.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Selepas kematian isteri tercinta, Mahmud, seorang hartawan telah berkahwin dengan Zubaidah, yang merupakan janda anak satu. Mahmud mempunyai seorang anak lelaki bernama Anuar dan anak angkat perempuan bernama Mira. Baharum, anak kepada Zubaidah berkawan baik dengan Mira. Apabila mereka meningkat dewasa, hubungan mereka bertambah erat dan saling mencintai antara satu sama lain. Anuar tidak senang dengan perhubungan itu kerana khuatir harta ayahnya akan jatuh ke tangan mereka berdua.

programme.title: Esok Untuk Siapa
programme.desc: Milah seorang peragawati yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat perusahaan batik milik Dato’ Iskandar. Dato’ Iskandar ingin menjodohkan Milah dengan anaknya, Ikhsan namun anaknya itu berkeras hati tidak mahu menurut kemahuan bapanya. Demi mengelakkan daripada menanggung malu, Milah bersetuju dinikahkan dengan Jiman, pengurus syarikat Dato’ Iskandar. Milah dan Jiman terlibat dalam satu kemalangan jalan raya sehingga mengakibatkan Jiman lumpuh dan mengalami kecederaan otak yang serius. Keadaan menjadi semakin teruk apabila Ikhsan memaksa Jiman untuk melepaskan Milah kerana dia ingin memperisterikan Milah.

programme.title: Penghujung Malam
programme.desc: Razak yang telah merantau membawa diri setelah rumahtangganya runtuh kira-kira 15 tahun yang lalu telah kembali ke Malaysia. Niatnya hanya satu, mahu membina semula rumahtangganya dan memastikan anaknya Rita yang kini berusia 19 tahun dan merupakan seorang penyanyi terkenal mendapat kasih sayang seorang bapa. Malangnya, bekas isteri dan anaknya itu tidak mahu menerima Razak malah menaruh perasaan benci yang amat sangat terhadap dirinya.

programme.title: Esok Masih Ada
programme.desc: Kematian satu-satunya anak miliknya akibat leukemia mengubah hidup seorang pegawai polis. ASP Zamri kemudiannya bertemu dengan Marina dan menjalinkan hubungan sulit bersamanya. Pelbagai halangan perlu dihadapinya oleh kerana kerjanya sebagai seorang pegawai polis. Akhirnya, Marina dan Zamri pun berkahwin dan dikurniakan anak - namun anak tersebut diserahkan kepada isteri pertama Zamri, Faridah untuk dijaga.

programme.title: Pertentangan
programme.desc: Zainab dan Zabidi merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang dikurniakan dua orang anak lelaki. Zainab seorang isteri yang setia dan taat kepada perintah agama, namun suaminya gemar membuat maksiat. Mereka berpisah dan masing-masing mengambil seorang anak. Zabidi berkahwin dengan Farah dan menyerahkan anaknya itu kepada seorang kenalannya. Farah berlaku curang kepada Zabidi. Ketika Farah sedang keluar berfoya-foya di Singapura, Zabidi mengekorinya dan terlibat dalam satu kes pergaduhan sehingga dia dihukum penjara.

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Selepas kematian isteri tercinta, Mahmud, seorang hartawan telah berkahwin dengan Zubaidah, yang merupakan janda anak satu. Mahmud mempunyai seorang anak lelaki bernama Anuar dan anak angkat perempuan bernama Mira. Baharum, anak kepada Zubaidah berkawan baik dengan Mira. Pelbagai halangan perlu dihadapinya oleh kerana kerjanya sebagai seorang pegawai polis. Akhirnya, Marina dan Zamri pun berkahwin dan dikurniakan anak - namun anak tersebut diserahkan kepada isteri pertama Zamri, Faridah untuk dijaga.

programme.title: Pertentangan

Zainab seorang isteri yang setia dan taat kepada perintah agama, namun suaminya gemar membuat maksiat. Mereka berpisah dan masing-masing mengambil seorang anak. Zabidi berkahwin dengan Farah dan menyerahkan anaknya itu kepada seorang kenalannya. Farah berlaku curang kepada Zabidi. Ketika Farah sedang keluar berfoya-foya di Singapura, Zabidi mengekorinya dan terlibat dalam satu kes pergaduhan sehingga dia dihukum penjara.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.title: Esok Untuk Siapa
programme.desc: Milah seorang peragawati yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat perusahaan batik milik Dato’ Iskandar. Dato’ Iskandar ingin menjodohkan Milah dengan anaknya, Ikhsan namun anaknya itu berkeras hati tidak mahu menurut kemahuan bapanya. Demi mengelakkan daripada menanggung malu, Milah bersetuju dinikahkan dengan Jiman, pengurus syarikat Dato’ Iskandar. Milah dan Jiman terlibat dalam satu kemalangan jalan raya sehingga mengakibatkan Jiman lumpuh dan mengalami kecederaan otak yang serius. Keadaan menjadi semakin teruk apabila Ikhsan memaksa Jiman untuk melepaskan Milah kerana dia ingin memperisterikan Milah.

programme.title: Menanti Hari Esok
programme.desc: Kisah sebuah keluarga yang mengalami kejatuhan moral kerana pegangan agama yang tidak utuh. Talib yang menghidapi barah harus melalui pelbagai konflik sementara menunggu masa untuk pergi. Anaknya, Jalil mula bersikap derhaka manakala anak keduanya, Ayu hamil luar nikah. Perasaan dikhianati dan ingin mengkhianati mula menguasai diri, pengakhirannya membawa kepada satu kematian.

programme.title: Esok Masih Ada
programme.desc: Kematian satu-satunya anak miliknya akibat leukemia mengubah hidup seorang pegawai polis. ASP Zamri kemudiannya bertemu dengan Marina dan menjalinkan hubungan sulit bersamanya. Pelbagai halangan perlu dihadapinya oleh kerana kerjanya sebagai seorang pegawai polis. Akhirnya, Marina dan Zamri pun berkahwin dan dikurniakan anak - namun anak tersebut diserahkan kepada isteri pertama Zamri, Faridah untuk dijaga.

programme.title: Ribut Barat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri, Adnan dan Azizah baru pulang ke tanah air selepas berkahwin di England. Azizah sering memandang rendah kepada keluarga suaminya yang berasal dari kampung. Adnan terlalu sayangkan isterinya sehingga sanggup melupakan ibu bapanya untuk menyenangkan hati isteri. Budaya barat yang diamalkan Adnan dan isterinya itu juga telah menyebabkan rumahtangga mereka retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Pertentangan
programme.desc: Zainab dan Zabidi merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang dikurniakan dua orang anak lelaki. Zainab seorang isteri yang setia dan taat kepada perintah agama, namun suaminya gemar membuat maksiat. Mereka berpisah dan masing-masing mengambil seorang anak. Zabidi berkahwin dengan Farah dan menyerahkan anaknya itu kepada seorang kenalannya. Farah berlaku curang kepada Zabidi. Ketika Farah sedang keluar berfoya-foya di Singapura, Zabidi mengekorinya dan terlibat dalam satu kes pergaduhan sehingga dia dihukum penjara.

programme.title: Bila Hati Telah Retak
programme.desc: Diceraikan oleh suami kaki perempuan, seorang wanita memulakan kehidupan baru. Bekerja sebagai bidan kerajaan - namun tidak disenangi seorang bidan tradisional. Pelbagai tohmahan dilemparkan kepadanya sebagai cara untuk dia diusir keluar tetapi bapa saudaranya ada memberikan sokongan moral. Setelah satu insiden berlaku di kampung itu, penduduk lain mula menerimanya.

programme.title: Penghujung Malam
programme.desc: Razak yang telah merantau membawa diri setelah rumahtangganya runtuh kira-kira 15 tahun yang lalu telah kembali ke Malaysia. Niatnya hanya satu, mahu membina semula rumahtangganya dan memastikan anaknya Rita yang kini berusia 19 tahun dan merupakan seorang penyanyi terkenal mendapat kasih sayang seorang bapa. Malangnya, bekas isteri dan anaknya itu tidak mahu menerima Razak malah menaruh perasaan benci yang amat sangat terhadap dirinya.

programme.title: Melati Putih
programme.desc: Melati bercita-cita tinggi tetapi tidak dapat melaksanakannya kerana tergoda dengan seorang doktor muda. Akibat hubungan dengan doktor itu, nama baiknya telah tercemar. Seorang pemuda cacat di kampung itu jatuh hati padanya tetapi cinta lelaki itu dipermainkannya. Setelah Melati dikecewakan oleh doktor itu, barulah dia sedar cinta suci si pemuda itu.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.title: Semalam di Malaysia
programme.desc: Victor Abdullah, penyanyi terkenal yang menetap di Malaysia berkenalan dengan Sandra, mahasiswa di Indonesia. Rumimah, pembantu rumah Sandra ternyata bukanlah seperti apa yang disangka Sandra. Rahsia dan kisah silam terungkit kembali apabila suami dan anak lelakinya yang disangka telah meninggal dunia sebenarnya masih hidup. Pertemuan semula mereka telah membongkar segalanya.

programme.title: Esok Untuk Siapa
programme.desc: Milah seorang peragawati yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat perusahaan batik milik Dato’ Iskandar. Dato’ Iskandar ingin menjodohkan Milah dengan anaknya, Ikhsan namun anaknya itu berkeras hati tidak mahu menurut kemahuan bapanya. Demi mengelakkan daripada menanggung malu, Milah bersetuju dinikahkan dengan Jiman, pengurus syarikat Dato’ Iskandar. Milah dan Jiman terlibat dalam satu kemalangan jalan raya sehingga mengakibatkan Jiman lumpuh dan mengalami kecederaan otak yang serius. Keadaan menjadi semakin teruk apabila Ikhsan memaksa Jiman untuk melepaskan Milah kerana dia ingin memperisterikan Milah.

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Mahmud, seorang taikun yang berkahwin dengan seorang janda yang mempunyai seorang anak lelaki, Zubaidah adalah pengusaha restoran. Baharum, anak kepada zubaidah berkawan dengan Mahmud anak angkat Mira sejak kecil. Apabila dewasa, hubungan mereka semakin kuat dan mereka saling menyayangi. Maher, bimbang harta peninggalan bapanya akan jatuh ke tangan mereka berdua.

programme.title: Mau Jadi Apa?
programme.desc: Nordin menghantar pembulinya, Roy, ke hospital. Rudy pula ditangkap polis. 6 bulan kemudian, Nordin menjuarai rancangan kuiz yang selalu ditonton oleh banduan-baduan sesama Rudy. Rudy mengecam Nordin dan mula merancang cara melarikan diri dari penjara supaya dapat membalas dendam ke atas Nordin.

programme.title: Pbtb Esan Indy
programme.desc: Tongkham seorang pemuda dari E-san yang hidup dalam kekurangan tetapi mempunyai cita-cita yang tinggi iaitu untuk manjadi pengarah filem yang terkenal dan ingin menikahi wanita yang dicintainya, pranee yang keluar negara untuk berkerja.

programme.title: The Spiral
programme.desc: Jon Caine, pensyarah universiti yang dihormati, didapati hilang. Tiga bulan kemudian dia muncul semula dan membunuh sekumpulan orang awam dan polis di sebuah kafe. Selepas ditangkap oleh Detektif Inspektor Aleana, dia dihantar ke hospital mental untuk disoal siasat oleh pakar psikologi jenayah, Dr Melanie Surya. Melanie tidak lama kemudian mengetahui bahawa kewujudannya adalah kunci kepada perubahan mendadak Jon dalam tingkah laku dan akhirnya, dia membuka kunci rahsia Jon yang telah disimpan dalam dirinya.

programme.title: Villa Angker Lembang
programme.desc: Kemal dan isterinya, Citra, merancang untuk membina perniagaan resort di atas tanah kosong di bandar Lembang.Kemal pergi ke sebuah kampung dan bertemu dengan Sujiwo, penjaga vila. Sujiwo menawarkannya sebuah resort lama yang telah ditinggalkan oleh pemiliknya di luar negara. Tidak lama kemudian, Kemal dan keluarga kecilnya menyedari bahawa vila itu berhantu. Mereka dihantui oleh figura jahat yang membawa mereka ke bahagian paling gelap resort.

programme.title: Instafamous
programme.desc: Telefilem Instafemous mengisahkan Sarah dan Fatin merupakan dua sahabat karib yang berlainan gaya hidup.Kehadiran Aidil, seorang Influencer Photographer, menjadikan hidup Fatin berubah, dia tiba-tiba dikenali di Instagram.Keghairahan Sarah (Eyka Farhana) untuk bergelar ‘instafamous’ di Instagram mengakibatkan persahabatannya dengan Fatin renggang.

programme.desc: Seorang perempuan indonesia datang ke kuala lumpur mengikut suaminya. Setelah berada di kuala lumpur dia berhasrat untuk bekerja di syarikat milik rakan suaminya. Majikannya itu merupakan seorang yang memiliki sikap dan perangai yang membuatnya sentiasa berada dalam keadaan serba salah dan tertekan. Sikap majikannya yang tidak mahu membayar hutang, menuduhnya mengambil wang syarikat dan tidak membayar gaji menyebabkan dia nekad untuk berhenti kerja. Namun kisah berakhir apabila dia bersetuju untuk bekerja semula apabila majikannya memintanya menguruskan kerja-kerja kebajikan membaiki rumah anak yatim.

programme.title: Jodoh Tak Salah Alamat
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Luqman pernah mengenali seorang gadis bernama Diana ketika Diana melanggar keretanya dahulu. Diana berpenampilan seksi dan mengamalkan cara hidup barat membuatkan Luqman bersangka buruk terhadap Diana. Satu hari, Luqman ke masjid dan terserempak dengan seorang gadis cantik iaitu Adawiyah. Tanpa mengetahui, Adawiyah dan Diana adalah orang yang sama. Diana pernah terlibat dengan kemalangan dan sejak itu hidupnya berubah sepenuhnya.

programme.desc: Mengisahkan Reza seorang pemuda yang gilakan bola sepak. Sehariannya tidak lengkap tanpa membincangkan tentang bola sepak. Dia juga seorang pemain amatur yang hebat, terutama bermain futsal. Namun setelah dia cedera, yang mana kecederaan itu telah disengajakan oleh musuhnya, Arman, dia tidak mampu untuk bermain lagi.

programme.title: Ku Tak Percaya Kamu Mati
programme.desc: Seorang budak sekolah rendah bernama Bagong maut selepas menjadi mangsa langgar lari. Kematian Bagong menjerumuskan ibunya ke dalam kemurungan yang mendalam. Tetapi tiba-tiba Bagong kembali dengan keadaan sebenar untuk menjaga ibunya yang sangat tertekan.

programme.title: Istri Yang Dijadikan Kambing Hitam Atas Kegagalan Suaminya
programme.desc: Dewi perlu menghadapi situasi yang sukar di mana anaknya perlu dirawat di hospital dan dalam keadaan kritikal, ditambah lagi suaminya didekati oleh rakan kerjanya, Alice.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep139
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Star Ep73
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep18
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep98
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep140
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Anak Pembuat Nisan Menjadi Pengusaha Pupuk Sukses
programme.desc: Demi anak mereka, Bagas dapat melanjutkan pelajaran ke universiti. Ibu Indah mencari pendapatan tambahan dengan menawarkan perkhidmatan dobi dan menggosok pakaian. Ini kerana suaminya hanya seorang pembuat batu nisan. Hingga satu tragedi melanda keluarga mereka, dan Bagas meneruskan perniagaan ayahnya menjadi seorang pembuat batu nisan.

programme.title: Suster El Ep14
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Awas Tercyduk Ep4
programme.desc: Awas Tercyduk, sebuah program realiti televisyen, mendedahkan kejadian yang tidak dijangka dalam kehidupan seharian kita.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep36
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: Anak Pembuat Nisan Menjadi Pengusaha Pupuk Sukses
programme.desc: Demi anak mereka, Bagas dapat melanjutkan pelajaran ke universiti. Ibu Indah mencari pendapatan tambahan dengan menawarkan perkhidmatan dobi dan menggosok pakaian. Ini kerana suaminya hanya seorang pembuat batu nisan. Hingga satu tragedi melanda keluarga mereka, dan Bagas meneruskan perniagaan ayahnya menjadi seorang pembuat batu nisan.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep18
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Suster El Ep14
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Awas Tercyduk Ep4
programme.desc: Awas Tercyduk, sebuah program realiti televisyen, mendedahkan kejadian yang tidak dijangka dalam kehidupan seharian kita.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep140
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Anak Pembuat Nisan Menjadi Pengusaha Pupuk Sukses
programme.desc: Demi anak mereka, Bagas dapat melanjutkan pelajaran ke universiti. Ibu Indah mencari pendapatan tambahan dengan menawarkan perkhidmatan dobi dan menggosok pakaian. Ini kerana suaminya hanya seorang pembuat batu nisan. Hingga satu tragedi melanda keluarga mereka, dan Bagas meneruskan perniagaan ayahnya menjadi seorang pembuat batu nisan.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep151
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Aku Istri Korban Gengsi Keluarga Suamiku
programme.desc: Kevin berkahwin dengan Meisya dengan majlis resepsi yang mewah menggunakan wang pinjaman dari kawannya. Namun, Kevin tidak mahu membayar hutang tersebut dan meminta ayah Meisya untuk melunasinya. Dengan tidak disangka, setelah hutang dilunaskan, Kevin berselingkuh dengan Diana, kawan isterinya sendiri.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep37
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: Cintanya Udah Gak Malu Malu Kucing
programme.desc: Rico dan Tami saling membenci tetapi juga saling mencintai. Dan yang uniknya, Tami alergi terhadap kucing sementara Rico menyukai kucing. Adakah mereka akan dapat bersatu walaupun dinding penghalang mereka adalah kucing?

programme.title: Aku dan Kamu Di Prok Prok Jadi Cinta
programme.desc: Alin dan Ajun adalah rakan sekelas, tetapi mereka tidak pernah serasi. Setiap kali mereka bertemu, mereka selalu bertengkar. Alin yang berada dalam golongan yang berada tidak suka bergaul dengan Ajun yang bekerja sebagai ahli silap mata dalam majlis hari jadi. Tetapi siapa sangka, apabila keluarga Alin jatuh miskin, hanya Ajun yang sentiasa ada untuk Alin. Alin mula menyukai Ajun. Lalu, bagaimana dengan perasaan Ajun terhadap Alin?

programme.title: Jalan-Jalan Sultan Ep2
programme.desc: Pengacara-pengacara meneroka beberapa destinasi pelancongan terbaik di Indonesia, dan bertanya soalan kepada beberapa pengunjung. Mereka yang menjawab dengan betul akan menerima hadiah.

programme.title: Take Point
programme.desc: An elite mercenary force get caught on a CIA mission which sparks fear of an impending World War III.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: Dancing Queen
programme.desc: A married couple in the midst of their mundane lives decides to pursue their lost dreams. The husband finds himself accidentally running for Mayor of Seoul and his wife decides to become a pop singer.

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: An aspiring news anchor and a struggling wrestler meets by chance at a burger joint. Through shared meals, they encourage each other to reach for their dreams!

programme.title: A Man Who Was Superman
programme.desc: Soo-jung met a man who claimed himself as a "superman" and loves to give a helping hand to people in need. She then realizes the story behind his seemingly weird behavior...

programme.title: Where The Truth Lies
programme.desc: Two Korean-American students are accused of murder but the investigation is thrown into confusion when the two suspects present contradicting accounts and evidence, and blame each other for the crime.

programme.title: 0.0Mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: Hindsight
programme.desc: A hitwoman is hired to keep a close eye on the retired mob boss, but things get complicated when they grow attached to each other at a cooking class…

programme.title: Cadaver
programme.desc: 6 med students participate in their first anatomy class, yet nightmare begins when they are assigned with a deadly beautiful cadaver.

programme.title: Kim Ji Young, Born 1982
programme.desc: Kim Ji-young, an ordinary Korean woman in her 30s, suddenly shows signs of being inhabited by her late mother and older sister after she becomes a stay-at-home mother.

programme.title: Sunset In My Hometown
programme.desc: When an unsuccessful rapper returns to his hometown to visit his sick father, he reconnects with the friends and family he left behind long ago.

programme.title: Take Off
programme.desc: Rounding up five inexperienced athletes from a small Korean town with nothing to lose, they form the first Korean ski jump team in hope of winning gold.

programme.title: Very Ordinary Couple
programme.desc: A couple working in the same bank broke up but continue to see each other in workplace. They couldn't help but pay attention to each other even more than they were dating...

programme.title: Moby Dick
programme.desc: After a mysterious explosion destroys a bridge outside Seoul, three journalists dig deeper into the case, only to uncover a government conspiracy that is bigger than they could have ever imagined.

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is An Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each other’s backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: The Age Of Blood
programme.desc: The once best swordsman in Joseon, Kim Ho, was demoted as a prison guard after a lost battle and fought with a rebel force that snuck into the jail to save their captured leader.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: Warriors Of The Dawn
programme.desc: To avoid invading Japanese forces, King Seonjo escapes to the Ming Empire. In his place, Prince Gwanghae leads the royal court and confronts the enemies with the help of proxy soldiers led by To-woo.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Guimoon: The Lightless Door
programme.desc: As exorcist Do-jin heads over to an abandoned community center with rumors of strange deaths, he met 3 college students there to capture the rumored events and realised they're trapped…

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: Cassiopeia
programme.desc: Soo-Jin is a successful lawyer and loving mother who tries to live a fulfilling life after her divorce, but things start to fall apart when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's after a car accident.

programme.title: Going By The Book
programme.desc: Things get out of control when an eager traffic cop who tends to do things by the book was chosen to act as a bank robber in a drill.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Cafe Midnight
programme.desc: Yoon went searching for her groom Taeyoung who didn't show up on the wedding day. She arrives at a strange place called 'Cafe Midnight' by chance and found a younger Taeyoung from the past.

programme.title: Me And Me
programme.desc: When a detective heads to a rural village to investigate the mysterious death of a couple, he finds himself in an inexplicable situation where his life is completely reversed.

programme.title: Where The Truth Lies
programme.desc: Two Korean-American students are accused of murder but the investigation is thrown into confusion when the two suspects present contradicting accounts and evidence, and blame each other for the crime.

programme.title: Very Ordinary Couple
programme.desc: A couple working in the same bank broke up but continue to see each other in workplace. They couldn't help but pay attention to each other even more than they were dating...

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: 4 years after the events of Garibong district round up operation, Geumcheon Police’s Major Crimes Unit is given a mission to repatriate a fugitive who fled to Vietnam.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Delightfully Deceitful Ep12
programme.desc: Ro-woom is a genius scam artist who lacks empathy, and Moo-young is an attorney who is excessively empathetic by nature. To battle evil, these two opposites team up to form an unlikely alliance.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3632
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46514652

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep4748
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2056
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep161
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep103
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep221222
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep453
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: The Wonder Woman(M) Ep1617
programme.desc: Be a "shark", if you're a woman, to survive in your working and personal relationship? DU,AI-SHA, also known as Shark, is aggressive and ruthless YI,FEI-YANG nickname is "Orca". Orcas kills sharks. That implies the relationship between them. They are friends and foes at the same time. They show no mercy and never surrender. Love comes and goes but friendship lasts forever. AI-SHA doesn't want to lose her best friend YI,FEI-YANG. She doesn't need love, but she needs him.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: A hijacking of a police van occurs when the Police Commissioner is away from Hong Kong. Deputy Commissioner Lee leads a rescue operation code-named Cold War. Fellow Deputy Commissioner Sean moves to take control from Lee as he thinks Lee is emotionally affected by his son being held hostage, but the efforts end up threatening both their reputation.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when De’s eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: A blind but talented pianist Siang encounters an unrecognized but skilful dancer Chieh. Chieh is attracted to the courageous Siang while Siang is fascinated by the adventurous Chieh. Their friendship grows as Siang and Chieh pursue their dreams together. Sandrine Pinna was awarded Best Actress for her role as Chieh in the 2012 Taipei Film Festival.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Daoji, a mystic monk during the Southern Song dynasty, has been tasked to protect the people from monsters. However, when the Emperor dies under suspicious circumstances, Daoji uncovers an evil conspiracy and must seek help from the Emperor of the Gods and five of the strongest demigods to combat the dark forces threatening the world!

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Roger’s family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kit’s master, Debo.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kong’s ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Liu’s family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: A Wedding Invitation
programme.desc: A boy’s marriage proposal was rejected by the girl and the lovers separated. Nonetheless, they agree on a break-up contract stating that if both are single in five years they will get married. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome life’s challenges.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s’ Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends…

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOU’RE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE – consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderella’s adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tian’s daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond…

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves “The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real “Chosen Sleuth” instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: When a terrorist group plots to obtain nuclear materials under the cover of a violent coup in Northern Africa, only the Chinese Navy’s elite, Jiaolong Assault Team, have the deadly skill and precision needed to take on the situation and rescue its citizens.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: The Dancing Millionaires is of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screens, starring husband & wife team Peter Chen Ho and Betty Loh Ti presenting some extraordinary performances.

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up - will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, as she is engaged to another man, they are kept apart. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: Ling Hu Chong, a Huashan clan’s disciple, is assigned to find the successor to the score “The Proud One”. Ling identifies Ying for the score but finds out that she is the daughter of the evil clan’s leader. At the same time, he is unwittingly dragged into an epic power struggle between clans, with complicated allegiances and perplexing moralities.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma breaks when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Man Of Iron
programme.desc: Chou Lian Huan (Chen Kuan Tai) is good at fist fighting in Shanghai. In order to please a hostess named Chen Ju Fang (Ching Li), he is willing to sacrifice everything and fight against the son of the gang leader in Shanghai. However, is Chou’s action worth it?

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang’s fiancé and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him…

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: After a notorious rapist Xiao kills his master and the entire clan, Han the last surviving disciple, decides to take revenge. He must find the legendary Hulong Blade to counter Xiao's Evil Poisonous Sword, but as Han has never seen Xiao before, he is deceived when Xiao poses as an ally to try and steal his Blade in the process.

programme.title: Let'S Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fiancé, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like…

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend “Investiture of the Gods”, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: The Boxer From The Temple
programme.desc: A young monk, The Kid, was expelled from the temple due to his crazy ways. After leaving the temple, he fights a cruel bandit's son and befriends a prostitute. As he fights for justice, his “Crazy Lo Han Fist” improves with every fight.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fiancé Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan…

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yen’s property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love…

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu’s until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Return To The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of ‘scaffolding kung fu”.

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Tea House
programme.desc: Real-life champion martial artist Chen Kuan-Tai plays a powerful role in this memorable saga of action and romance; fighting against gangsters for his true love.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father’s deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. Following their encounter, the two got involved in the underworld of boxing match gambling.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: Mr Funny - Bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fiancé to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: Iit Krishnamurthy
programme.desc: Tamil Mystery Thriller film, Starring - Dandamudi Pruthvi, Maira Doshi & Vinay Varma

programme.title: Ghazi
programme.desc: Tamil War Thriller, Starring, Rana Daggubati, Kay Kay Menon, Atul Kulkarni, Naaser, Om Puri & Others

programme.title: Thangaraja
programme.desc: Tamil Action Movie, Starring, Nagarjuna, Ramya Krishna, Naga Chaitanya and Krithi Shetty.

programme.desc: Tamil Action Thriller Film, Starring, Ram Charan, Priyanka Chopra, Mahie Gill, Sanjay Dutt & Others

programme.desc: Tamil political-drama movie, starring, Vijay Sethupathi, Aishwarya Rajesh, Munishkanth, and Vela Ramamoorthy

programme.title: Gorilla

programme.title: Pancharaksharam
programme.desc: Tamil supernatural thriller film, Starring, Santhosh Prathap, Madhu Shalini and Sana Althaf

programme.title: Podhuvaga En Manasu Thangam
programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Romantic Movie, Starring, Udhayanidhi Stalin, Nivetha Pethuraj, Parthiepan, Soori, Mayilsamy,Rajendran & Others

programme.desc: Tamil Romantic Comedy Film, Starring, Raiza Wilson, Harish Kalyan, Anand Babu, Raja Rani Pandian, Deepz & Others

programme.desc: Tamil comedy-​drama film, Starring, Sri Divya, Bobby Simha, Parvathy Thiruvothu, Rana Daggubati & Others

programme.title: The Rite
programme.desc: "Choosing not to believe in the devil won't protect you from him." Academy Award® winner Anthony Hopkins stars in this supernatural thriller that reveals the devil's reach to even one of the holiest places on earth. Inspired by true events chronicled by Rome-based journalist Matt Baglio, this exorcism drama follows a skeptical seminary student (Colin O'Donoghue) attending an exorcism school at the Vatican. While in Rome, he's sent to apprentice with an unorthodox priest (Hopkins) who introduces him to the darker side of his faith. Also starring I Am Legend's Alice Braga, Rome's Ciarán Hinds, Harry Potter's Toby Jones and Blade Runner's Rutger Hauer, this haunting chiller demonstrates how a disillusioned young priest ultimately finds his true faith by facing pure evil.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 2

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: What was Mark Whitacre thinking? A rising star at agri-industry giant Archer Daniels Midland (ADM), Whitacre suddenly turns whistleblower. Even as he exposes his company's multi-national price-fixing conspiracy to the FBI, Whitacre envisions himself being hailed as a hero of the common man and handed a promotion. But before all that can happen, the FBI needs evidence, so Whitacre eagerly agrees to wear a wire and carry a hidden tape recorder in his briefcase, imagining himself as a kind of de facto secret agent. Unfortunately for the FBI, their lead witness hasn't been quite so forthcoming about helping himself to the corporate coffers. Whitacre's ever-changing account frustrates the agents and threatens the case against ADM as it becomes almost impossible to decipher what is real and what is the product of Whitacre's rambling imagination. Based on the true story of the highest-ranking corporate whistleblower in U.S. history.

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: There's more than one way to lose your life to a killer. The hunt is on for a serial killer in San Francisco. Few cases in the history of true crime are as intriguing as that of Zodiac, a bizarre gunman in an executioner's hood, who taunts the police with dozens of letters containing eerie messages and cryptograms. Director David Fincher (Panic Room, Fight Club, Se7en) captures the story of the infamous killer who terrorized the city in the late 1960s. Jake Gyllenhaal (Jarhead, The Day After Tomorrow), Robert Downey, Jr. (Kiss Kiss, Bang Bang), Anthony Edwards ("ER") and Mark Ruffalo (We Don't Live Here Anymore, Rumor Has It...) star.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep1
programme.desc: That White House - Eleanor, Betty and Michelle enter new political roles. Series premiere.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep2
programme.desc: Voices Carry - Eleanor, Betty and Michelle face challenges in their first days in office.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep3
programme.desc: Please Allow Me - Eleanor, Betty and Michelle come of age and meet their future husbands.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep4
programme.desc: Cracked Pot - Eleanor, Betty and Michelle navigate the rising careers of their husbands.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep5
programme.desc: See Saw - Eleanor, Betty and Michelle advocate for their own issues as First Lady.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep6
programme.desc: Shout Out - Eleanor, Betty and Michelle’s daring stances put them in the spotlight.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep7
programme.desc: Nadir - Eleanor, Betty and Michelle battle public and personal hardships.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep8
programme.desc: Punch Perfect - Eleanor forces Franklin’s hand in assisting Jewish refugees fleeing Nazi Germany. While Jerry spends his retirement on the road, Betty seeks out new party companions at home. Despite Barack’s hesitations, Michelle directly speaks out about race.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep9
programme.desc: Rift - Eleanor rallies the country as the US enters World War II. After Betty’s addiction spirals, Jerry and her family intervene. Michelle joins Hillary Clinton on the 2016 presidential campaign trail to advocate for the dignity of American women.

programme.title: The First Lady Ep10
programme.desc: Victory Dance - Franklin gifts Eleanor the charter for the League of Nations. After rehab, Betty vows to help others with addiction problems. Barack and Michelle prepare to leave the White House, to continue making a difference in the world. Season finale.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep1
programme.desc: Diggers - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey get special access to a factory that makes as many as a hundred iconic yellow diggers every single day.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is the Middle East's best kept secret. It is a corner of Arabia of unparalleled beauty and unexpected landscapes. It's a land swept by incredible winds that nourish some of the most productive ecosystems of our planet inhabited by extraordinary creatures and some of the rarest animals of our Planet - the Arabian Sea Humpback Whale, Loggerhead Turtle and Arabian Wolf - as well as other incredible species such as the Arabian Chameleon, Caracal and Egyptian Vulture.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Alexander visits the awesome Gyeongbokgung Palace, picks something up at the vast Yangnyeongsi herbal market, and even takes a look at the lucrative culture of fortune-telling.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Megawave - Nazaré in Portugal is the site of the biggest ocean waves ever recorded on Earth. To understand what creates these monsters, we use specialist jet-ski cameras to ride the waves.

programme.desc: Louisiana - Robson is in America's deep south on the Tennessee River where he catches catfish in his hands. Then he's off to the Gulf of Mexico for blackfin tuna.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Carcassonne - Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Australia - It’s a UNESCO World Heritage Site, the largest sand island on earth, and home to wild dingoes, six-foot sand-worms, and eucalyptus woodlands. Find out how everything lives happily together in a complex ecosystem built entirely upon sand.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creature Comforts - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Walking with a Pangolin - Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers’ dogs.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Tsiba's New Mum - Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope’s tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Village Raiders - Leopard problems plague the community as hunger-ravaged predators roam dangerously close to nearby villages. The team at Ol Pejeta need to safely snare a leopard and relocate it for the good of man and beast.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep1
programme.desc: When the Rain Comes - The Arabian landscape is a virtually waterless desert where rain scarcely falls and animals endure blistering temperatures. But for 3 months every year, a remote region on the south west coast undergoes an astonishing transformation… into a lush, verdant oasis.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Heidelberg - Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep2

programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Relentless Sun - A once-in-a-generation drought has sucked all the moisture from surrounding rivers and the conservation team is struggling to keep up with the swath of thirsty creatures. While some animals succumb to dehydration, the team must concentrate its efforts on a particularly vulnerable - and dangerous - water buffalo.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Heidelberg - Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Carcassonne - Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Australia - It’s a UNESCO World Heritage Site, the largest sand island on earth, and home to wild dingoes, six-foot sand-worms, and eucalyptus woodlands. Find out how everything lives happily together in a complex ecosystem built entirely upon sand.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creature Comforts - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Walking with a Pangolin - Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers’ dogs.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Tsiba's New Mum - Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope’s tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Bush Camps - Eco-tourism isn't just a background player in the operation of Ol Pejeta, it's the financial backbone that keeps the park operating. From comfortable camping to ultra-luxurious accommodation, the guests that stay at Ol Pejeta live among nature during their stay and they even assist in research and tracking park wildlife.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Girls of Oryx Plain - A baby rhino's mother is illegally shot and Ol Pejeta staff have to calm the wild baby. It's not ideal to separate the calf from her mother, but the situation is dire, and the calf will have to be hand-raised. Also, a look at a four-year-old captive rhino that went through the same thing and is now entering a new stage in life.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cradle of Mankind - Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Cold Blood - It sometimes feels like mammals rule the world; there are well over 5,000 species, colonising every corner of the globe. But in Arabia there’s a different story – this is a land where reptiles rule.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep6
programme.desc: California - The beaches of California are some of the most beautiful in the world, but are they falling out of balance due to mankind’s effects on nature? What does it take for the magnificent fauna of the Pacific Coast to keep living… on the “living beach”?

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep6
programme.desc: To the Rescue - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including “ranch manager” Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Walking with a Pangolin - Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers’ dogs.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep4
