programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Rio the Giant River Otter Pup - Visit the last stronghold of the giant river otter in Brazil’s beautiful Pantanal wetland. Track pup Rio and his siblings as they test the waters, team up to evade a jaguar ambush, and become a cohesive family unit that hunts and thrives together.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - Locals call it the ‘arribada’, or ‘arrival’. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - Locals call it the ‘arribada’, or ‘arrival’. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Critical Plains - While the Ol Pejeta staff help move a herd of hartebeest to another park, an ailing eland is spotted. Suffering from a wound from an illegal trap, the massive antelope will have to be tranquilized and treated before it's too late. After the eland is dealt with, a baby hartebeest will need to be herded back with her main group of antelope.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Crossing the Danakil - The Danakil Depression in Ethiopia is not only one of the most inhospitable places on Earth, but is one of the most geologically active. Now, volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer is taking a group of adventure tourists to cross the Danakil to see the Erte Ale volcano.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Savannah Life - The Savannah is a complex web of life, from the plants at the bottom of the food chain to the predators at the top. Stories of life and death have unfolded on these plains for millions of years.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Springbok & Impala: Life in the Herd - From the dry deserts of the west to the moist savannas of the east, these two species are pivotal in the success of both plants and animals living across this divide.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Chasing Freedom - Witness veterinarian Dr. Amanda Salb save an elephant calf caught in a poacher’s snare, racing time to treat the wound. Back at the base, an orphaned baby baboon meets his new family. A monitor lizard and duiker are returned to freedom in the wild.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Monkey Madness - Amanda puts a radio collar on one of the first cheetah cubs born in Malawi in twenty years and the team struggles to give a 4-meter python a physical. See a group of tourists deliver a rambunctious baby monkey they rescued from the pet trade.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealand’s Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu - Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealand’s South Island, where one of the world’s longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi - Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawatāwhi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island - Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island - Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Critical Plains - While the Ol Pejeta staff help move a herd of hartebeest to another park, an ailing eland is spotted. Suffering from a wound from an illegal trap, the massive antelope will have to be tranquilized and treated before it's too late. After the eland is dealt with, a baby hartebeest will need to be herded back with her main group of antelope.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Chasing Freedom - Witness veterinarian Dr. Amanda Salb save an elephant calf caught in a poacher’s snare, racing time to treat the wound. Back at the base, an orphaned baby baboon meets his new family. A monitor lizard and duiker are returned to freedom in the wild.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Monkey Madness - Amanda puts a radio collar on one of the first cheetah cubs born in Malawi in twenty years and the team struggles to give a 4-meter python a physical. See a group of tourists deliver a rambunctious baby monkey they rescued from the pet trade.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Great Escape - Watch as the Lilongwe Wildlife team try to release two serval cats into the wild. One escapes and returns injured. Will their release be successful? A new baby vervet arrives in critical condition, and a giant owl flies to freedom.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Ngorongoro Crater - Cursed Heaven - This episode explores Tanzania's Ngorongoro Crater. It looks at what lies within the crater’s walls and examines how the surrounding areas impact life within Ngorongoro.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island - Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep5

programme.title: Michela's Classic Italian S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Welsh-Italian cook Michela Chiappa shares her favourite recipes for classic Italian dishes, and meets some renowned chefs.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show S30 Ep14
programme.desc: Graham is joined by actors Michelle Williams, Helena Bonham Carter and Brendan Fraser, writer Russell T Davies and Strictly star Oti Mabuse.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Danielle and Frank's Float Room - In Monmouthshire, a 100-year-old lighthouse is the venue for Simon and his team's latest project. After running it as a B&B business, Danielle and Frank have decided they want their home back.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Lynn and Mick's Romany Caravan - Simon and the team go to Epsom Downs in Surrey to help turn a bow-top caravan into a romantic B&B that will be the focal point of Lynn and Mick's wedding business.

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Nigella's grandmother's recipe for creme caramel provides the inspiration for a simple but elegant dessert of caramel custard.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S6 Ep13
programme.desc: On day three of finals week, the six remaining bakers create tower-stacked illusion bakes that deceive the eye, and make fault line cakes revealing the flavours on the inside.

programme.title: Hungry For It S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The doors to the HFI hub are open! Ten rookie cooks set off on the ultimate crash course on how to make it in the food business.

programme.title: Eat Well For Less S7 Ep1
programme.desc: Gregg and Chris are in Windsor helping time-poor mum, Holly and sons Spencer and Fletcher, who rely on microwave ready meals. Can they convince Holly to cook from scratch in order to save for a much needed holiday?

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S6 Ep13
programme.desc: On day three of finals week, the six remaining bakers create tower-stacked illusion bakes that deceive the eye, and make fault line cakes revealing the flavours on the inside.

programme.desc: Toby and Islay's Sonar Hull - Simon and his team visit Toby and his daughter Islay in Pembrokeshire, where Toby has already created some unusual spaces on his campsite, but needs help on his latest big idea of turning a sonar hull from a warship into a land-locked submarine.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep8
programme.desc: David, Sue and Katie's Treehouse - Simon and his team head to Taunton, in Somerset, on an enchanted journey to meet David, Sue and daughter Katie, a family obsessed with fairies and all things magical.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Rick travels across the Roseland Peninsula, starting with a spot thought to have been visited by Jesus, before visiting picturesque St Mawes and the attractive harbourside village of Mousehole.

programme.desc: It's the semi-final and the junior bakers tackle a cute-but-tough Technical, and one of the hardest French patisserie skills with a Junior Bake Off twist: 3D choux centrepieces.

programme.desc: It's chicken week, and the cooks compete to get their marinades on Nando's menus in over 450 restaurants across the nation. But when service begins, one cook is missing in action.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Victoria and Raheel - Two architects compete using virtual reality to remodel a 1990s build in Milton Keynes. Will the finished design fulfill the dreams of the family of six who live there?

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Will's Combine Harvester - Will's family have been farming their land in Lincolnshire for generations. However, in order to generate some extra income, Will calls Simon to help create a unique agricultural-themed B&B.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Nigel and Maria's Caravan - In 2017, Nigel and Maria inherited a 400-year-old farm near Cullompton, in Devon, and want to give up their day jobs to spend as much time as they can on the farm with their family.

programme.title: Donal's Family Food in Minutes S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Today Donal shares recipes for dishes including a crispy chicken potato salad, chocolate chip banana bread, and 'greeneroni soup'.

programme.title: Rick Stein: From Venice to Istanbul S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Rick's journey ends in the legendary city of Istanbul, where he arrives just in time for the bluefish season. He also cooks lavish kofte kebabs with pistachios and the Black Sea dish kapuska.

programme.title: Hungry For It S1 Ep3
programme.desc: It's waste week. The cooks level up the basic meal deal and create a menu entirely out of leftovers. But one cook's journey in the contest comes to a premature end.

programme.title: Eat Well For Less S7 Ep2
programme.desc: Two single mums in Manchester need Gregg and Chris' help! Working together to feed both families after school is tricky with everyone's different tastes, so can the boys find them tasty meals they can all enjoy together?

programme.title: Donal's Family Food in Minutes S1 Ep5

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep30
programme.desc: Farewell, General Sherwood / Zoom Boomer - After a memorial for a famous tree that has fallen, Archibald discovers that Sage has never cried and vows to help his brother get in touch with his emotions. / When Archibald wins the chance be shot from a cannon at the circus, he has no idea everyone in town is vying to be his plus one.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep4
programme.desc: This Means Warts - When snobby neighbors move in next door and complain about a bone pile blocking their backyard view, The Croods launch into the first-ever prank war.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep30
programme.desc: Lucky and the Two-Wheeled Terror - When Lucky and the PALs arrive home from the circus, they find that Maricela and her new bicycle have become the star attraction in Miradero

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep4
programme.desc: FruLess / Citizen Cape - The Harvey Girls set off to help unfriendly Frufru make friends in time birthday party! Dot gets a little carried away after starting a fashion-forward cape business.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep4
programme.desc: African Queen / Mega Snails - The FAST crew is tricked into going to Africa by the Queen of the Banana Slugs for a dangerous journey through the plains in order to save her tribe. // White Shadow is challenged by three over-zealous and over-sized championship sumo wrestler snails to an outrageous wrestling match.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep30
programme.desc: Farewell, General Sherwood / Zoom Boomer - After a memorial for a famous tree that has fallen, Archibald discovers that Sage has never cried and vows to help his brother get in touch with his emotions. / When Archibald wins the chance be shot from a cannon at the circus, he has no idea everyone in town is vying to be his plus one.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep7
programme.desc: Reign Of Fireworms - Fireworms invade Dragon's Edge, while Ruffnut and Tuffnut discover that they have an unexpected connection to the island.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep24
programme.desc: Clickety Clacks / Rocksy’s Thing - Rocksy’s “talent” goes to her head when she and Berry accidentally invent tap dancing. / Rocksy finds one end of a shoelace and tasks her friends with helping her free it so she can have a thing of her very own.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep4
programme.desc: Duchess - The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep8
programme.desc: Eye'll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep8
programme.desc: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep4

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep8

programme.desc: Crushing It - As a Rumblehorn wreaks havoc on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup seeks the help of Stoick – who forms an unexpected bond with the rampaging beast.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep4
programme.desc: When Darkness Falls - On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover its indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep24
programme.desc: Clickety Clacks / Rocksy’s Thing - Rocksy’s “talent” goes to her head when she and Berry accidentally invent tap dancing. / Rocksy finds one end of a shoelace and tasks her friends with helping her free it so she can have a thing of her very own.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep4
programme.desc: Duchess - The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep65
programme.desc: Bumble's Special Lunch - Fifi has invited the other tots over to lunch but she is not very well. Bumble gamely steps in and offers to cook for her. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep66
programme.desc: Fifi Misses Me Not - Bumble has gone off on a pollen collecting expedition. He wishes Fifi was with him. Meanwhile, back in the garden, Fifi is missing her best friend too.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep67
programme.desc: Pirate Primrose - The tots are playing at pirates, all except Primrose, who is being a princess, naturally. But guess which tot has the best pirating skills when they are needed

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep68
programme.desc: Primrose Loses It - Primrose has broken her new necklace and lost the beads. She is unconsolable. Violet holds a make and do party to replace the necklace

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep13
programme.desc: Why Do Bees Make Honey? - Mimi's munching some honey sandwiches at the Hutch when Jess comes to visit. She shows him the lovely pots of honey she has and he wonders why bees need to make it. He thinks maybe Jess wonders if it might be used as glue but when Horace singing him a groovy song about HOW honey is made, Jess has an idea that it might be used as food during the winter when there's no pollen..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep14
programme.desc: When Will The Owl Go Hooooo!? - Jess is excited to tell the children at home all about the Owl he heard Hoo Hoo'ing in the night and he wants to let us hear it. He tries everything he can think of to get the Owl to hoot until he works out that it was nightime when he last heard the owl, so it he waits til it's night again we might just all get to hear the lovely sound of the Owl.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep15
programme.desc: Where's My Puddle Gone? - Jess wants the puppies to come Puddle Jumping with him. There were lots of puddles the day before but when they get to the spot, the puddle's GONE! Jess goes searching - has someone taken it? Borrowed it? No, he works out that the water's gone back up in to the clouds.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep16
programme.desc: Why Has My Shadow Gone Away? - Jess has s new friend - Horace tells him it's his shadow. Jess is keen to introduce him to all his friends, but he keeps running away! Jess works out that the sun has to be shining for the shadow to come back and that all the friends have their Own shadows to play games with too.

programme.title: Olivia Ep13
programme.desc: Olivia And Grandma's Visit - Grandma is coming to visit, and Olivia couldn't be more excited. She's less excited, however, about having to give up her bedroom and bunk with Ian. But when Grandma invites Olivia to share her room for a sleepover, Olivia finds out that rooming with her snoring grandmother isn't as much fun as she thought!

programme.title: Olivia Ep14
programme.desc: Olivia Is Invited To Dinner - Olivia is thrilled to be invited to Francine's for dinner, until she learns that she must reciprocate with an invitation. She worries that Francine will be unimpressed by her family's casual table manners. But after dinner at Francine's proves not to be much fun, Olivia appreciates her own lively family dinners.

programme.title: Olivia Ep15
programme.desc: Olivia Measures Up - After Olivia teases Ian for being too short for a ride, Father mentions that someday Ian may be the taller sibling. Olivia employs a variety of comical methods to stop Ian from growing. She eventually comes to terms with her own height – with the help of a great pair of shoes!

programme.title: Olivia Ep16
programme.desc: Olivia And The Old West - The class bullfrog is lose, and Mrs. Hogenmuller leaves Olivia in charge as she goes to track it down. Olivia imagines herself as the sheriff of a Wild West town, keeping order and defending against a stampede of giant bullfrogs. But can shedo it alone, or will she need a little help – from Francine?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep13
programme.desc: Why Vulture Is Bald - You see there was time when Vulture was not bald. Oh no, Vulture's head was covered in a beautiful crown of golden plumage! Vain Vulture never shut up about her golden feathers and was obsessed about making them ‘as golden as the sun!'. One day Vulture decides to fly up to the sun, but her precious feathers get burnt! Vulture decides to sooth her smoking feathers with golden honey which she steals from the bees. The bees are not pleased and Vulture sticks her head down Aardvark's burrow. However, Aardvark loves feathers all covered in honey and when Vulture surfaces she is as bald as… well, as a Vulture! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep14
programme.desc: Why Giraffe Has A Long Neck - You see there was a time when Giraffe didn't have a long neck. Her neck was all short and stumpy and she was a very delicate eater. All the food in Tinga Tinga seemed to make her tummy go funny. Then one day Lion suggests she try some honey. With the Bees permission, Giraffe tries to lick the honey… but it is deep, deep inside the tree. Giraffe squeezes her head into the honey tree and then EEEeeek! Her head gets stuck! Summer, Autumn, Winter pass by with Giraffe's head stuck inside the tree, but she is quite happy because the honey is so delicious. The tree grows and Giraffe's neck gets longer and longer! After a whole year ‘POP!' she manages to pull herself free and from that day on Giraffe has a very long neck and can eat the freshest leaves on the very tops of the trees! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep15
programme.desc: Why Porcupine Has Quills - You see there was a time when Porcupine didn't have quills, she had the softest coat in all of Tinga Tinga… and Jackal wanted it. Despite warnings from all the animals Porcupine allows Jackal to invite her to his cave to keep out of the rain. Porcupine takes off her coat to allow it to dry, but while she sleeps naughty Jackal runs off with it. When she awakes Porcupine is covered in lots of tiny ant bites and they itch and they itch and they itch. Tortoise suggests Elephant squeeze some milk from the Milky Quill bush… but Porcupine can't wait anymore and runs into the Quill bushes to relieve her itching. Crash! Crash! Crash! Porcupine crashes through the Quill bushes and emerges covered in spikey quills! The animals can't believe their eyes! But Porcupine is delighted as no beast will ever come near her sensitive skin ever again! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep16
programme.desc: Why Lizard Always Hides Under Rocks - You see there was a time when Lizard didn't hide under rocks. He would scamper around Tinga Tinga pinching other animals food and keeping it all for himself. Then one day the animals decide to give greedy Lizard a dose of his own medicine. When Lizard realizes the error of his ways he runs and hides under a rock too ashamed to show his face in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep35
programme.desc: Mega Fat - After Mega Fat is fired from Baby Corp;he’s forced on the path of recovery towards being a Good Baby. However;Mega Fat is more interested in getting revenge on Boss Baby than finding the perfect family to adopt him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezee’s Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep57
programme.desc: Too Many Cats - A myriad of Puss clones pour forth from the portal, each with a different personality, until eventually an evil twin shows up to challenge the real Puss

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep31
programme.desc: Snow Day / Guy Misses Out - It only snows one day a year in Troll Village, and Poppy, Branch, and Smidge want to make the most of it. Poppy tries to finally get in a hit in her annual snowball fight with Peppy; Branch is determined to make up for the snow days he missed while in his bunker; Smidge tries to get first place in all of the Snow Day competitions./While waiting for the perfect time to make his big entrance at a party, Guy misses the formation of an inside joke. The Snack Pack tells him “he just had to be there,” but Guy sets out to understand the joke and get in on the laughter.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep31
programme.desc: Lucky and the Rough Ride - The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, it’s up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep5
programme.desc: Hang Ten in Tahiti - Wally and Wenda head to Tahiti to help Wizard Wavybeard find his lost Wave Key. Odlulu sees the Wave Key as her chance to become the best surfer in Tahiti and earn a statue of herself on the beach. The Wanderers and Odlulu have a surf-off, and the winner gets the key.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep5
programme.desc: Pupcakes \ Stink or Swim - When Tag discovers that Scooch is a great baker, she encourages him to start a pupcake stand. But when Tag rounds up more customers than Scooch is prepared to handle, Scooch can’t keep up with the demand. \ Tag and Scooch’s race to pick up the most trash on Pawston Beach is thwarted by Frank and Beans, who just want to make more of a mess.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep5
programme.desc: The Amazing Donna / Bye, Bye Boardie - When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sam’s favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep9
programme.desc: The Case Of Deltoid's Strange Behaviour - Smartysaurus is upset because her best friend, Deltoid, keeps calling her a monster and running away from her. Noddy decides to investigate and find out why Deltoid's behaving so strangely. He soon discovers that Deltoid has lost all his memories and doesn't recognise any of his friends anymore. It takes all Noddy's powers of deduction and gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet to realise that Deltoid has lost his memory chip! All he has to do now is stop Deltoid trying to trap Smartysaurus long enough to refit the chip and restore his memories. Good luck Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep10
programme.desc: The Case Of The Slippery Stage - Pat-Pat is meant to be giving a baton twirling display at the Town Hall but the stage is covered with sticky stuff. Clockwork Mouse and Carlton can clear up the sticky stuff but Noddy must investigate to find out who was trying to spoil Pat-Pat's show or they might do it again! Using his wwwbook to follow all the clues from polishing day at the Fairy Castle to Fairy Coco swapping the polish for a ribbon, Noddy works out it was Pat-Pat who tried to delay her show. She wanted to practise more! Noddy and Bumpy help Pat-Pat to feel confident about the performance and she gives a great display. Thanks, Noddy!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep31
programme.desc: Egg's Day Out / The Way of the Snake - Archibald takes care of a lost egg for the day. But when the egg starts to crack, Archibald has to get the egg back to its parents. / After Archibald’s arms fall asleep, he joins a dojo ran by snakes and embraces a life without appendages.

programme.desc: Achoo ! - Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.desc: Pups Save a Manatee / Pups Save Breakfast - Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp. // Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.desc: Whale of a Tale / The Pirate Painter - When whales start to pile up in Caracole Cove, Santi and crew must stop the noisy undersea disruption to their usual migration pattern. // When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.desc: Whale of a Tale - When whales start to pile up in Caracole Cove, Santi and crew must stop the noisy undersea disruption to their usual migration pattern.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Paramedic Power - When Blaze's friends need help, Ambulance Blaze, Paramedic AJ and Paramedic Gabby have all the tools they need to save the day!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep309

programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? A strange odor is chasing the jungle animals away from their homes. // Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler - Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time? // Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep603
programme.desc: A Giant Harvest Day! - Holiday Cooks Molly and Gil, on a mission to save the town's Harvest Day (Thanksgiving) feast, must retrieve a Golden Tomato from magical Tall Tale Farms. But first, their food knowledge is tested by three guardians!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Mailtime Mystery - It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

Can Deer Squad save the parade? // Pollen from Bobbi's snuffleblooms makes everyone start getting super sneezes. Lola activates her Critter Care Centre to help everyone!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The supersized sunflower / Moontaker - Ricardo hosts a sunflower competition, but Lola is worried hers is ill - surely a little Wood Power will perk it up? // Lady Fluffpot wants a statue made of moon rock, but the deer know that messing with the moon is a bad idea!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green - Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington & says he can thank him by passing it on to someone else, which is harder than it sounds! // Paddington learns all about composting thanks to Mr. Mulch, but will he grow flowers in time for Aunt Lucy?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Pups Save a Tour Bus / Pups Save Midnight at the Museum - Mayor Humdinger's tour bus goes out of control when he tries to bring tourists to Foggy Bottom! PAW Patrol to the rescue! // A fun museum sleepover is interrupted when Alex and the mini-patrol go missing, and Mayor Goodway gets stranded on a T-Rex!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep702
programme.desc: Pups Save Election Day / Pups Save the Bubble Monkeys - When Mayor Humdinger runs for Mayor of Adventure Bay, his Mayor Mobile runs out of control, the Paw Patrol have to save the day! // Ryder and the Pups visit Tracker and Carlos in the jungle, a group of monkeys find themselves in sticky trouble!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Don't Look Now - During a sleepover Bossy and Turtle watch a scary movie but may have bitten off more than they can chew.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Show and Smell - Bossy and Turtle bring fun and weird smelling food for "Show and Smell".

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Spring Kick-off Games - Gran-Gran; Bossy is tired of losing at the Spring Kickoff Games.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The Pirate Painter - When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep706
programme.desc: The Snowflake Games - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep312
programme.desc: The Big Ant-venture - Blaze and Zeg are on Animal Island when they discover a world of tiny creatures right under their tires: Insect City! The friends transform into a super-strong ant and a bouncy grasshopper for their littlest big adventure yet!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and got lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates. // Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Pups Save a Freaky Pup-Day / Pups Save a Runaway Mayor - Chase and Chickaletta switch bodies and must learn to work together to return Cap'n Turbot's boat to the bay. // Mayor Humdinger creates robotic Pants to cheat at the Most Amazing Athlete Contest. They go haywire so Pups have to save runaway Mayor.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor / Sink or Swim - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work - Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News - The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisõit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Jaw-some Sharkventure! - Zooli and her crew of Marine Biologists escort their new friends Baby Shark and his pilot fish William to visit Baby Shark's great-great-great-great-great Uncle Slow Mo, and help them escape the determined fisherman who's chasing them!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Tickety's Big Musical Morning - Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Something New at Blue's School - Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Legend of Capitán Calavera - When Santiago discovers the lost treasure of the legendary Capitán Calavera, he and his friends become the new Pirate Protectors of Isla Encanto.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Don't Look Now - During a sleepover Bossy and Turtle watch a scary movie but may have bitten off more than they can chew.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Spring Kick-off Games - Gran-Gran; Bossy is tired of losing at the Spring Kickoff Games.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Show and Smell - Bossy and Turtle bring fun and weird smelling food for "Show and Smell".

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep711
programme.desc: Pups Save the Skydivers - Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a day filled with Skydiving fun, but their adventure is quickly derailed. It's Paw Patrol to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bat Family / Pups Save a Mud Monster - A rockslide traps a Bat Family inside their cave, so the Pups have to free them! The bats search for a new home leads to problems in town though! // Snowboarders on Jake's Mountain are stuck on a broken chair lift while a monster is on the loose!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep79
programme.desc: Yellow - It's a special day for yellow Laa-Laa. Big yellow flowers grow in Teletubbyland and a yellow balloon leads Laa-Laa to Tiddlytubby Umby Pumby.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Bee - Dee encourages a friend to say 'bee' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different bees. There are stripy bees, buzzy bees, and yellow, black and fuzzy bees.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep63
programme.desc: A Friend Too Far - Two friends are separated by a short distance but a long drop... can Team Tinpo bring them together?

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep10
programme.desc: It's time to look at old pictures - A photo of Gran Gran and JoJo's mummy when she was a little girl inspires them to take a walk and compare old photos of their neighbourhood to see how it has changed over time.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Topsy Turvy Time - Monty is in a topsy-turvy mood and doing things a little bit differently, leaving him questioning why things always have to be same.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Never Mending Story - The Kazoops decide to replace their broken couch, but Monty doesn't think being broken makes something useless.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Horsey Ride - When Bluey forgets to put her favourite toy away, Socks grabs it! The kids stage a horsey wedding to distract her, with Dad and Uncle Stripe as the horses!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep30
programme.desc: The Topiary Badge - When the Squirrels see Duggee practicing his impressive Topiary skills they are keen to try some of their own - and promptly put their new talents into practice in order to tame some very wild woods!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep29
programme.desc: The Favourite Badge - The Squirrels learn what a favourite is, but have trouble deciding what their own favourite things are, so they make a film asking some of their friends what is special to them to help narrow it down.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep28
programme.desc: The Round Up Badge - The Squirrels go on the trail of a lost herd of cattle with Duggee and his old pal Rodeo Horse, who teaches them how to be cowhands... and earn their Round Up Badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Monteverde Cloud Forest, Costa Rica - A feather duster drama unfolds high in the Monteverde Cloud Forest when Glitch's feather collecting goes wrong. Can the Go Jetters save a rare bird's nest and find a lost trophy?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Fatberg, London Sewers, England - While Lars, Kelly and Xuli go into the sewers to help keep London clean, Glitch and the Grimbots create some enormous blockages after flushing wet wipes down the toilet.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Fruit Bat - Not wanting to go to bed, Bluey tries to dream about being a nocturnal fruit bat so she can stay up all night long and soon finds herself flying through the night sky.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Bbq - It's lunchtime on Bluey's deck! But the BBQ needs a salad, so Bingo's relaxing sit-down will have to wait until she finds every colour of capsicum her cousins asked for!

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Andy and the Tusk Fish - Andy heads to the Great Barrier Reef off the coast of Australia in search of a tusk fish.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Teeny Tiny Creatures S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Slugs - Chantelle visits a local school that has a nature garden, whilst Rory meets a slug expert.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Tooth Fairy - Gem enlists another four youngsters to help find her stolen jewels and Captain Sinker plots to steal the gold coins from the Tooth Fairy - but he needs to find a way of attracting her to the island.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep27
programme.desc: The Game Show Badge - The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them by putting on a Game Show, with some help hosting from his good friend Ladybug.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep26
programme.desc: The Puddle Badge - Happy sets his sights on a very questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in, much to the horror of Duggee and the other Squirrels - and the tiny citizens of Midgetropolis who live inside it!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep25
programme.desc: The Biology Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels hop inside the Biology Bus and miniaturize themselves to go on a voyage of discovery inside Enid, to find out what's making her cough.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Hollywood, USA - After winning a part in a Hollywood film, Glitch is not happy when he has to work with Kyan to finish a scene.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep52
programme.desc: Sami Reindeer Herding, Norway - The Go Jetters are in snowy Norway to learn about the Sami reindeer. The reindeers are migrating and need to get a ferry to their warmer summer home.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep16
programme.desc: Jumping Jobi Wood - Thomas is ordered to collect some precious Jobi wood from Misty Island. Chaos ensues when naughty crane Old Wheezy starts throwing the logs everywhere.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Toy Tidy - Duck has been leaving his toys everywhere, so Sarah decides to assist him with tidying his bedroom.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Shallot Circus - The Shallots have discovered acrobatics, and are inspired by the Ribbon Sisters to put on a show.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep22
programme.desc: If a Tree Falls - Nelly and Nora go exploring to find out what made the big noise in the forest.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Dog Loves Elephant - Dog and Pug meet and Elephant and a mongoose, who cannot play together because they are two completely difference sizes. Dog and Pug solve the problem by helping them to work together.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Coconut Safari Club - Monty is surprised when his family tell him that Jimmy Jones can't appreciate music because he's an animal.

programme.title: Dinopaws S1 Ep37
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Ours - The Dinopaws build a treehouse but find they can't agree on how to decorate it.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep62
programme.desc: Get On Track - Mayor Sho-Po would like the team to build a shortcut through the Po Forest... without taking away any trees!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep61
programme.desc: Training Wheels - Tinpo helps Logi-Po to feel part of the team when he can't pull Uni-Board tricks like Doug-Po.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Bingo - When Bluey has a playdate at Chloe's, Bingo must learn how to play by herself. But all the games she knows need more than one person! Luckily Dad has a problem that needs solving.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep24
programme.desc: The Taste Badge - Duggee is making a smoothie. The Squirrels can't agree on whether it's delicious or horrible, so they make their own adventurous smoothies showcasing their favourite flavours to discover what taste is.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep23
programme.desc: The Mix Tape Badge - The Squirrels are exploring in the attic when they find an old cassette tape, and decide to make a mixtape for Duggee to remind him of all the happy memories they've made while earning their badges.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep22
programme.desc: The Election Badge - It's time for the summer fair. Eugene is the organiser, but it's so much work that he quits - he can't take the pressure. So it's up to the Squirrels and their friends to find a new leader.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Ilulissat, Greenland - Grandmaster Glitch has travelled to Ilulissat in Greenland to show his teddy, Cuddles, the sights. But Cuddles ends up getting stuck in the snow!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Horsetail Fall, California - The Go Jetters have travelled to Horsetail Fall in the Yosemite National Park to watch the 300m high waterfall become Firefall.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep8

programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We bring you the headlines and latest on the day's top stories, plus breaking news and live reports from the scene as events unfold.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep25
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents the main international news of the week, as reported by ABC News correspondents deployed in Bangkok, Jakarta, Jerusalem, London, New Delhi, Port Moresby, Taipei, Tokyo and Washington.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep54
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep23
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: China Tonight Ep11
programme.desc: 2023 marks 50 years since Prime Minister Gough Whitlam's 1973 diplomatic trip to China, the first by an Australian Prime Minister and a milestone in Australia-China relations. Will Anthony Albanese repeat the trip this year?

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 17 - Brisbane Lions v West Coast Eagles Ep97
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2023 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 17 - GWS Giants v Hawthorn Ep98
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2023 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 17 - St Kilda v Melbourne Ep99
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2023 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep20
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Inspiring, entertaining and full of practical advice, join Costa Georgiadis and the team as they unearth gardening ideas, meet avid gardeners and look at some of the most inspiring gardens from across the country.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep23
programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep22
programme.desc: Everybody loves it until they're on it! Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep54
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - The Rookies battle busted hoses and finally hit treasure, Boulder Boys Aaron and Greg bring in an old monster about to self-destruct, and at their wash plant, The Cooke Brothers race to beat the worst drought in a decade.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Emmett vs Topuria
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC Fight Night: Emmett vs Topuria is set to take place in June 2023, featuring a highly anticipated matchup between featherweight contenders Josh Emmett and Ilia Topuria. Both fighters bring an impressive record of wins and knockouts, promising an explosive battle in the octagon. The event will also showcase a stacked card of undercard and preliminary fights, featuring some of the best up-and-coming talent in the sport. UFC Fight Night: Emmett vs Topuria is a must-watch event for fans of mixed martial arts, promising an unforgettable night of high-octane action and fierce competition.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep1
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep1
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts

programme.title: 2023 Motul TT Assen Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship crowns one of 22 riders lining up on 1000cc prototype bikes capable of producing over 240 horsepower and getting up to speeds of 350kph over 21 Grand Prix races.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Prelims - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus’ night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now he’ll look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Main Event - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus’ night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now he’ll look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.

The event will also showcase a stacked card of undercard and preliminary fights, featuring some of the best up-and-coming talent in the sport. UFC Fight Night: Emmett vs Topuria is a must-watch event for fans of mixed martial arts, promising an unforgettable night of high-octane action and fierce competition.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC280OliveiravsMakhachev

Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Prelims - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus’ night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now he’ll look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.
